advanced_settings.title: Advanced Settings
advanced_settings.description:
Configure integration-level debug settings.

Frontend log level controls browser console logging for Ramses Extras cards/editors.
Log level controls the backend Python logging level for the Ramses Extras integration.

Ramses Debugger:
- A flow is a unique (src, dst) pair observed in ramses_cc message events.
- Cache TTL/max entries reduce duplicate work when multiple debugger cards poll at the same time.
- Buffer limits cap in-memory message retention for browsing.
